data.what_is:
Welcome to Andovar! We're the go-to partner for top global brands worldwide. From humble beginnings, we've grown to become a major player in the language services industry, translating billions of words for clients across a variety of sectors. With a proven track record of serving top-tier global brands around the world, we specialize in delivering high-quality multilingual content that resonates with your target audience. Incorporating a hybrid model, working with professional translators and best of breed AI-powered translation technology, we ensure your content is translated quickly and cost-effectively, without sacrificing quality. Whether you need website localization, marketing materials, or product descriptions, we've got you covered. With our expertise in cultural nuances and deep understanding of local markets, we'll help you connect with your customers on a global scale. Let us take your brand to the next level!

> Global language services provider 
 
Andovar is a global provider of multilingual content solutions. Headquartered in Singapore with offices in Thailand, Colombia, India, USA, Hungary, and China, our services range from text translation and content creation, through audio and video recording, to turnkey localization of websites, software, eLearning, video and games.  
 
> Offshore Production, international quality 
 
We started in Southeast Asia, with Western ownership and management. Expanding production across low-cost countries has allowed us to offer more competitive pricing, while keeping quality at the highest international level.  
 
> Emerging markets, complex media projects 
 
Andovar specializes in localization for emerging markets and technologies, such as web & ecommerce, mobile, gaming, multimedia, and cloud software. Emerging markets of Asia and the Middle East are still a challenge in localization and where others struggle with complex scripts and lack of standards, Andovar has the expertise to succeed. 
 
> Medium sized, Employee owned 
 
We are a medium-sized company that is small enough to be agile and adaptable, yet big enough to handle projects of any size. While others try to automate everything and make localization a numbers game, Andovar creates customized solutions for each client to meet their needs and budgets. Andovar is employee-owned, and everyone has a stake in our clients' success. 
 
> Technology Agnostic, Global teams 
 
We do not sell software solutions, but we do extend the latest best-of-breed technology for our clients at no additional cost. Professional talent located throughout the world coupled with these technologies means we are a one-stop-shop for all localization projects regardless of size, type and languages required.
data.product_description: Translating and voicing in over 200 language pairs across a range of specialized industries, we're the turnkey solution for any translation need.
data.supported_languages: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Czech, Danish, German, Greek, English, Estonian, Persian, Finnish, French, Irish, Hebrew, Hindi, Croatian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Central Khmer, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malayalam, Marathi, Mongolian, Malay, Burmese, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Tagalog, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional)

initial_reviews.review_title: Video content transcription, translation, closed captions
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
AI is advancing in leaps and bounds but with each process step that is involved before we can publish videos online, we cannot solely depend on AI for end results that are going to satisfy the needs of a very demographically diverse audience. This is where Andovar come in. We can (and do) work with them on a per project basis and can choose between their AI service of human. With the former, the AI content generated is still reviewed and cross-checked by professional translators (etc) which is a service that we cannot fully replicate in house.

Customer support is prompt and very responsive and, so far, Andovar has delivered within each predetermined deadline which, as a media company, is essential for us.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
No significant dislikes encountered yet. Providing all requirements are clearly itemized pre kick-off, that is what you are going to receive.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
I would definitely recommend using Andovar's localization and global translation services for quality online content production.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
We work with Andovar to rapidly turn around online video content, seeking their assistance with transcriptions, translations and the production of closed captions (subtitles) generated and provided to us in .srt format.

initial_reviews.review_title: Andovar is a saviour!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
The responsiveness and transparence in communication.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Nothing in particular, may be negotiable rate discussions?

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
If you have used them before, you know how easy it is work with them and how Andovar can provide solutions.

if you have never used them before, give them a try as translator/proof reader/validator and you will be able to add one more reliable resource for your briefs and the language pair combinations

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar is one of the few vendors we have for some tricky and rate language combinations  (eg Divehi, Myanmar Burmese etc). Having worked with Andovar on one of the Divehi project for validation, I can say they were really detailed in the analysis of the review and was able to provide a solution.

initial_reviews.review_title: COO
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
Andovar was on top of every detail and shared their linguist expertise who knows every detail of gaming terms in order to provide the best translation result for the Ragnarok IP game project.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
There are no particular things related to this 'dislike' part with Andovar by far.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
Andovar team works with the utmost professionalism, from the first introduction to after project completion.
Andovar was on top of every detail and shared their linguist expertise who knows every detail of gaming terms in order to provide the best translation result for the Ragnarok IP game project.
We will certainly look to Andovar's experience as a partner for future projects.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Game Translation

initial_reviews.review_title: Localisation and Development
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
The communication with PMs has been excellent and Andovar are very accommodating at allocating a PM in the same time zone.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
There were some issues with some translators and a lack of consistency at times.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
Andovar are always happy to meet virtually. I would recommend taking that opportunity, as written communication can get confusing at times. :-)

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar has helped us with various translation projects and also development work to very tight deadlines. They have always been able to provide more resources to meet our deadlines and delivered promptly. Their team of developers is excellent, always approachable with outstanding technical knowledge and happy to get familiar with our preferred authoring tools. Communication with PMs is very good and very efficient, even if the time zone is sometimes slightly different.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great friendly service at a competitive price
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
Foremost, friendly service and price, but actually accuracy of translation was a very high priority, successfully achieved.  Turnaround is fast, and we are kept informed of progress.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Not Applicable, we did not have any negative comments to make about this supplier (at the moment), so long let that be so.  Our use of this supplier is small, as we do not have that much use for a service of this kind, rather than we consciously avoid using them.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
try them out, test the service, check out the prices.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
creating closed captions for on-demand content.  We needed translation and to create closed captions for our on-demand content that makes sense to our niche-market international audience, we needed a translation service that took into account highly specialist language terms and context.  Andovar does that efficiently and at a competitive price.

initial_reviews.review_title: Quality service and customer focus
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
All the work we have done with you has been of the highest quality. We felt well looked after by both the sales staff and the project managers. Our demands are attended to and the most effective solution is sought for everyone.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Price can sometimes be a constraint, as we work for clients who sometimes have to localise their content into many languages.
Sometimes not being in the same time zone is also a problem, but sometimes a benefit.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
Quality work.
Project monitoring.
Feeling listened to.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
It provides us with quality translations and voice-overs, seeking the best solution for our project. It also integrates these translations into different software (Articulate, Vyond...), which allows us to provide our clients with services in languages with different alphabets (Chinese, Arabic, Indonesian...).

initial_reviews.review_title: Quick turnaround and responsive account manager
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
They were happy to tweak the translation based on feedback from my client for no additonal cost and were able to send over quotes quickly. It was a very smotth process working with them.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
No issues working with them so nothing to dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
Keep them informed of your timings so that they can ensure there is someone available to work on your project at the appropriate time.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar helped us to translate a survey into three languages. It was really helpful to work with a company that can translate so many languages and for the same cost for each languages, meaning that I only had to work with one organisation. The servive was very quick and the team were very responsive to my questions.

initial_reviews.review_title: Why I Continue to Work with Andovar
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
Results oriented, and they dont quibble about money or getting paid first before they do any work..they want to make customers happy. So on our part, we want to make sure they get paid without too much delay.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Nothing. Been working with them since more than 10 years back.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
World class quality, client focused and fast!

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Mandarin translation services in Manila were not acceptable to our team in Mainland China. We produced marketing collaterals in Mandarin that were considered quality and applicable to locals in China. Also, Andovar works really fast and efficiently...

initial_reviews.review_title: Overall pleasant experience
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
The studio was very professional and the staff were quite friendly and willing to let me give direction to the voice actor.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
The translation services provided for Korean language weren't optimal and caused us to scramble and find a freelancer to improve the translation.

For voiceovers, the pricing isn't flexible depending on length of the recording between 1 minute or 7 minutes, which I found a bit odd.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
The voiceover services are quite good and they provided suitable voice talent in the accents required.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar provided voiceovers and translations for some of my projects.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good quality and affordable Timed Text (Subtitles) .
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
Andovar are transparent with their pricing, provides very good project management and delivers on time

What do you dislike about Andovar?
They are currently (2023) not Netflix NPFP certified.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
They have a good team who want to help you, so if you are open and clear they will give you suggestions and options and work together with you to achieve the end goal. It feels like a partnership.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a need for various languages subtitles, which we are unable to handle in-house, to be created/translated for use on major streaming platforms. Andovar provide these language pairs for us at a competitive price

initial_reviews.review_title: Seamless and Efficient Localization Services: A Great Experience with Andovar
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
I recently had the pleasure of utilizing the localization services offered by Andovar, and I am thrilled to share my fantastic experience. Their expertise in translating and localizing strings into Bahasa Indonesia exceeded my expectations, making the entire process smooth and hassle-free.

From the initial inquiry to the final delivery, Andovar displayed a high level of professionalism and dedication. The team was prompt in responding to my queries, providing detailed information about their services and pricing structure. Their transparent approach instilled confidence in me right from the start.

One aspect that truly stood out was the good quality of their translations.  The project was completed within the agreed-upon timeline, without compromising on the quality of the work.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Not much details were provided about the translator and their domain expertise background

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar provides Localization Services. We took their services in getting our localized strings into Bahasa Indonesia as we didnt have an inhouse translationteam.
Their expertise in localization ensures that our WMS Application content seamlessly adapts to the linguistic and cultural nuances of Bahasa Indonesia, resulting in an authentic user experience.

initial_reviews.review_title: Efficient and collaborative translation service streamlining multilingual communication.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
The team behind it! From the initial inquiry to the final delivery, the friendly and knowledgeable staff ensure a seamless and efficient translation process.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
On larger translation projects it would be helpful to be given an estimated deadline or kept up to date with the timeline of translations.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
My experience with this translation service has been nothing short of exceptional. Their friendly and professional team, combined with their timely and accurate translations have become invaluable assets to our work. I wholehartedly reccomend this outstanding service to any organization in need of high-quality translations and a truely collaborative experience.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
This remarkable service offers seamless and accurate translations from English into multiple languages, enabling usto reach a broader global audience with ease.

initial_reviews.review_title: A speedy, transparent service that delivers everytime
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
Andovar's personal approach is why we still use them. They're friendly and helpful. They're clearly experts in what they do and don't patronise as some in the industry do.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
There doesn't seem to be a portal or business 'way in' to Andovar. Could there be a means to submit a request which leads to a conversation? Or which could contain a ticklist or grab bag type menu where customers can select from services that they know they need?

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar provides high quality translation and localisation for our learning content. This can be video, written copy or digital learning modules. Andovar provide a personal service and always provide great consultancy with value-adding questions to uncover our need and get requirements right first time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very good service!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
It's an easy service to use, professionals are polite and responses are never late.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
No complaints, Andovar has been providing us with great service.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar is translating in a quick and efficient way any content we might need to deliver to our clients.

initial_reviews.review_title: Client review for translation works
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
Proactive pre-sales and project support group

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Certain projects require to be translated into a single language before translating to the languages as expected of the project. Which is an indicator of increased timeline and costs.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
Be specific of the project requirements, best is to send an actual sample of the game project translation.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Translate game projects between multiple languages. Andovar is proficient with;
- Understanding of gaming lingo across different cultures.
- Translation between multiple languages.
- Cost and timeline efficient.

initial_reviews.review_title: CE has been extremely satisfied with Andovar's customer service and quality of deliverables.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
The response time of the Andovar team is exceptional.  Also, the quality of the product delivered is extremely well received by CE clients.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
If we had to pick out something, I would say the estimated turnaround time for deliverables sometimes does exceed the initial estimate but rarely.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar is been very diligent in working on continuing the refine the quality assurance check process which helps our internal team during their review.

initial_reviews.review_title: Unlock Your Global Potential with Andovar - A Premier Localization Partner You Can Rely On!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
What I like best about Andovar is their team. They are incredibly responsive, always willing to help and have become an extension of our team rather than just a vendor. Our experience working with Andovar has been truly exceptional, and we owe much of our success to their dedicated team. I want to give a special thanks to Paulina Gallego, our Account Manager, for her outstanding support and guidance. Additionally, Santiago Morales and Julio Calderon, our Account Project Managers, who have been a pleasure to work with and have consistently gone above and beyond to ensure our needs are met. I strongly recommend Andovar to anyone looking for high-quality localization services with a team that feels like an extension of your own.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
To be honest, there's very little I dislike about Andovar. If I had to mention one thing, it would be that the translation management system used in our work could be more user-friendly. However, this is a minor issue and has not impacted the high-quality translations Andovar delivers. In fact, despite the minor issues with the system, Andovar's team has consistently delivered excellent translations in a timely and professional manner. Furthermore, they have always been responsive to our needs and have provided exceptional customer service. While there is room for improvement in the translation management system, the overall experience of working with Andovar has been fantastic and we are happy to continue partnering with them.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
If you are considering working with Andovar, I would highly recommend streamlining and organizing the process to generate efficiencies and create synergies. Here are my recommendations:

1) Streamline communications by integrating with Slack or a similar messaging platform to communicate with Andovar. This will help to streamline communication and reduce response times.
2) Streamline file sharing by using a shared cloud-based drive. This will help to ensure that files are easily accessible and can be shared quickly.
3) Develop quality glossaries that are specific to your industry, also known as a termbase, as this will help to ensure correct translations of industry-specific terms and jargon.
4) Ensure that your English content is of high quality to avoid quality issues in the translations. It's important to remember that the quality of the source content will impact the quality of the translated outputs delivered.
5) Understand the Andovar process so that you can focus on key areas that will facilitate their work. By understanding their process, you can help to ensure that the project runs smoothly and efficiently.

Overall, I highly recommend working with Andovar for their exceptional localization services and outstanding customer support. By following these recommendations, you can help to ensure a seamless and successful partnership with Andovar."

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar is solving the challenge of localizing our content into multiple languages, which can be a complex and time-consuming process. Thanks to Andovar's expert localization services, we're able to deliver our E-Learning content in multiple languages in a smooth and hassle-free manner. Their team has delivered high-quality translations and ensured that all the content is in a ready-to-distribute format, which has been incredibly beneficial to our business. Their efficient and reliable service has saved us a significant amount of time and effort, and we couldn't be more pleased with the results.

initial_reviews.review_title: Satisfied.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
Project management- meeting the deadlines and responsiveness.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Quality of the translations could be better in the first round and we did not have to go back and forth.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
Very good project management !

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
When the quality of the translation was not good, they accepted it and tried to resolve the problem instead of denying it existed.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very professional. No drama.

Professional and quick

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Language. Design. Artwork

initial_reviews.review_title: Amazing Customer Service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
The best thing i liked about Andoar is their TAT.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Nothing i can think of, as i had the best experience

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
The customer service received by Andovar team is highly commendable. i need not had to follow up for the work to get done. The business process seemed to be very seamless.

wishing more sucess for Andovar team.
Thanks
Bornali Hazarika
QuidelOrtho

initial_reviews.review_title: Best service at a good price!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
Andovar offers the best service at a good price. For each project you get a project manager to follow up and give feedback. The timeline is always respected and if needed they can deliver really fast!

What do you dislike about Andovar?
I have worked with Andovar on multiple projects but I can't think of anything that didn't went right.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
Don't waste time on getting quotes from other translation agencies, just go for the best!

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Business critical info should be available in multiple languages. That's where Andovar comes in!

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent team, great pricing, always delivers
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
The team from start to finish is attentive, detailed, and fair. We trust their pricing and know they will deliver.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Nothing at all. We love working with their team.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
Take the time to reach out and get a quote for the work you need done.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
We need both text and audio translations for our wellness app in 14 languages. We've been able to achieve all of this and create a wellness app that is unrivaled for global equity.

initial_reviews.review_title: Everything's perfect
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
What I like the most is the friendliness of all the people working in Andovar but also the professionality and the very fast response time. All our translation requests were satisfied within very reasonable times.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
i did not find anything that was unhelpful. Really everything has always been smooth and fine. Translations were always of good quality and no local colleague complained about the quality of them.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
I would recommend Andovar as per friendliness, professionality, response time and costs that are in line with the market.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Andovar is helping the company in the localization, meaning the translation of our very big company website. the website is very complex and Andovar was able to help us in the translation of 2 languages (Spanish and Polish)

initial_reviews.review_title: Accurate and Communicative
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
They are very communicative. Consistently delivering accurate work. They have friendly and courteous team members.  And they always fall within or below budget.

What do you dislike about Andovar?
Rarely do we have to ask for something twice. There's nothing we don't like about working with tAndovar and their team members.  Not sure what else I can say here.

Recommendations to others considering Andovar:
They are reliable and within budget.

What problems is Andovar solving and how is that benefiting you?
Gave us client solutions with translations for copy and video. We are able to use them on several separate accounts for various deliverables in different languages.

initial_reviews.review_title: I contract Andovar for multiple services, namely studio recordings with professional actors
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Andovar?
account management readiness and communication
in project problem solving and adaptability
pricing

What do you dislike about Andovar?
I don't have particularly dislikes, I would like to have more indept knowledge of areas of work that Andovar does not do and solutions they have that we are not using
